text: On skazal: Â«O moy narod! A chto, yesli ya opirayus' na dokazatel'stvo ot moyego Gospoda, i On daroval mne prekrasnuyu dolyu? YA ne khochu otlichat'sya ot vas i sovershat' to, chto ya zapreshchayu sovershat' vam, a khochu lish' ispravit' to, chto v moikh silakh. Pomogayet mne tol'ko Allakh. Na Nego odnogo ya upovayu, k Nemu odnomu obrashchayus'
